C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: {BasedOnStyle: LLVM, AlignAfterOpenBracket: Align, AlignConsecutiveMacros: { Enabled: true }, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, AlignOperands: true, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: false, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: None, BinPackArguments: false, BinPackParameters: false, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, BreakBeforeTernaryOperators: false, ColumnLimit: 120, DerivePointerAlignment: true, IncludeBlocks: Regroup, IndentCaseLabels: true, IndentWidth: 4, MaxEmptyLinesToKeep: 1, PointerAlignment: Right, SortIncludes: true, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 4, AlignConsecutiveBitFields: { Enabled: true }, BitFieldColonSpacing: Before, InsertBraces: true, InsertNewlineAtEOF: true, KeepEmptyLines: { AtStartOfBlock: false, AtEndOfFile: false, AtStartOfFile: false }, LineEnding: CRLF, QualifierAlignment: Left, RemoveParentheses: MultipleParentheses, SeparateDefinitionBlocks: Always, AllowShortLambdasOnASingleLine: None }
